name: Give 1
description: Make someone drink

name: Give 2
description: Give two drinks

name: Give 3
description: Give three drinks

name: Take 1
description: Drink - Take one for the team

name: Take 2
description: Drink twice - It will help speed along the game

name: Take 3
description: Drink three times - you've earned it

name: Putsie Backsie
description: Put that block back where you found it

name: Question Master
description: Ask any question you want - if someone answers it, they have to drink.

name: Beep Beep I'm a Jeep
description: To step away from the game, get on all fours and say "beep beep, I'm a Jeep". Drink if you forget.

name: Was it worth it?
description: Drink for every year spent in college

name: Toast
description: Make it good - everyone drinks

name: Karma
description: Give two drinks to whoever came after you last

name: Waterfall
description: Start the chug

name: Trivia
description: Ask someone a trivia question - if they're wrong, they drink

name: Was it worth it?
description: Drink for every year spent in college

name: Karaoke
description: Sing a song for the group or chug a full drink

name: Old man
description: Oldest person drinks

name: Stretch
description: Tallest person drinks

name: The Real Slim Shady
description: You must play the rest of the game standing up

name: Karaoke
description: Sing a song for the group or chug a full drink

name: Foreigner
description: Speak with an accent for the rest of the game - If you forget, drink

name: Lefty
description: Remove the next block with your non dominant hand

name: Categories
description: Choose a category. Everyone must name something in it. If you repeat or get stuck, you drink.

name: For the boys
description: All men drink

name: Ladies night
description: All women drink

name: King for a game.
description: Make up a new rule. Anything goes.
